title: Increase logo size for better visual harmony

requirements.text: Increase the logo size in the header navigation to be larger and more visually harmonious with the overall layout

quotes: almente o tamanho da logo para um tamanho maior e mais armonico

acceptanceCriteria: Logo appears noticeably larger in the header
Logo size is proportional and harmonious with other header elements
Logo maintains proper spacing and alignment in the header
Logo scales appropriately on mobile devices

constraints: Do not modify the Layout component's authentication logic or menu structure
nonGoals: Modifying other header elements besides logo size
